name: Havoc
description:
Set during a futuristic interstellar war, Havoc aims to provide players with a fun but challenging multiplayer experience. Enjoy electric team-based gameplay and player-focused map designs. Havoc delivers in-depth weapon customization, unique equipment based abilities, class-related perks, and various aesthetic customization options.



The early access beta includes the OutReach, Abyss, AfterMath, BloodFrost, and BlackSite multiplayer maps in addition to classic game modes like Team Deathmatch, Capture The Flag, Domination, Search and Destroy, Ranked, and Gun Game. New weapons, abilities, equipment, and maps will be added during weekly scheduled updates. We are always looking to add new game modes, weapons, and abilities. Be sure to follow our webpage to participate in community-based polls and discussions.

Key Features


  • Innovative survival mechanics
  • Competitive third-person shooter
  • Adaptive gameplay
  • Ranked lobbies
  • Epic futuristic environments
  • Cooperative gameplay
  • Weekly updates
  • Steam achievements
  • Support for steam friends
